reviews.review_msg: I am not really sure what's up with these comments on her, shes super friendly and funny If you even put a little bit of effort in, you will get an great grade She is a fair marker, gives good feedback Really nice lady, respectful, willing to answer any questions.

Tyler Wereha is hands down the best professor I've ever had. He is well spoken, relatable, and kind. If you get the chance to take a class with Tyler make sure you don't squander it. His lectures are so much fun you will be counting the days until your next class. I took PSYC1100 with him and I regularly reference what he taught me in daily life.

Bryan is really hilarious, energetic & passionate prof. His lectures are usually interesting but sometimes it could be boring. He often focuses on the biological aspect of the course because that's his field. Also, his exams are challenging in my opinion but the assignment is not that bad. Not a tough marker & I did good on his class!

The in class demonstrations by Lisa were fantastic. The evidence of preparation and the time she takes to help her students are what makes her great. I loved the writing assignments because their instructions were very clear. Work hard and you will see results!

Lisa is very kind and means well but I did not like the class. I was not able gain knowledge in psychology. My mark was affected due to her lack of communication to the class on what she expected. As well, she is willing to give help but sometimes she does not understand what you are asking. I did not enjoy her class.

TOUGH GRADER. Due to Covid-19 the lecture is being delivered online. His lecture is very short. 15-20 minutes per chapter. HOWEVER, exam is insanely difficult. You'd better memorize every single word on your textbook. He does not teach much but exam covers broad amount of knowledge.
